Works perfectly so far, don't worry just download.

1st attempt: mount iso with magic disk \ install \ InstallProduct Error: 0x80070643 = no love.

2nd attempt: unziped iso \ install from the directory \ InstallProduct Error: 0x80070643 = no love.

3rd attempt: installed winlive \ install DR2 with firewall and antivirus off \ InstallProduct Error: 0x80070643 = unhappy face.

system = win xp pro SP3 duel core 2g-ram 

any suggestions?

Adding and/or replacing the .dll to win 32 did not fix the install error, it was worth a shot though. Seen a few people with the same error im getting but it seems like the install works for the majority of downloaders. Maybe it has to do with our systems.

I found the solution to the save problem...

What you have to do is

1- copy every file from DR2 to the DR2 installation folder on your pc.

2- crack the game

3- run the game as admin

and its done...

it worked for me

This is one tough torrent for me. I just CAN'T get it to work. I've done the msvcr100.dll thing and cracked the game. When i start the game, the black screen comes up and in a few moments, it says that Dead Rising 2 is not responding.... -.- anyone ?

I made a user just to say:
Unrar the one called sr-dr2.iso (only that one!)
2. Mount it with MagicDisc etc.
3. go to computer -> dead rising 2 -> setup.exe, run it!
4. Follow on screen, serial: 0000-0000-0000-0000 etc.
5. find the installation folder for Dead rising on your cdrive!
6. Copy EVERYTHING inside the skidrow folder over to the installation folder on ur cdrive!

Hopefully i cleared up some problems, noobs be crazy!
